name: Patina - Connecticut - Rustic
additionalNotes: Patina Cigars are made from some of the best tobaccos Nicaragua has to offer and makes this cigar on the cutting edge of boutique brands.Â Originally founded in Chicago, Illinois, Patina cigars have become some of the most popular cigars across the nation. Patina Cigars was founded by Mo Maali and named after the oxidation that occurs over time. For Maali, Patina Cigars is more than just a good cigar. Instead Maali wants "Patina to be the cigar of choice when someone wants to celebrate a personal achievement or milestone." And most of all, he wants people know that his heart and soul is in these cigar.
